scriptLines.text: There are wolves in the forest - you know, because you've been hearing them howl in the distance, and as you traverse the woods, you've been hearing the occasional growling - albeit higher pitched than you would expect.

scriptLines.text: Once you've collapsed, she seems to lose all interest.  She scratches behind her ear with her heel, then bounds off without a word.
